review_title: Public Sector Client, with very high principles for Growth
pros: Learnt a huge amount regarding framework provision in the public sector, developed new contacts in new markets and an understanding of public sectors clients priorities. Know far more regarding Local Authorities, NHS and Blue Light works. Feel very well versed and confident to talk about Public Sector work
cons: The time frames were very long and unclear decision making processes. Project changes and movements reliant on a contributory facts from National and Local government which made strategising. and prioritising difficult to plan.

pros: Supportive teams, exciting company, varied work
cons: Busy, lots to do, could be better paid
